array.text: View a Boss's info to learn more about its core skills.
If you fall in battle, study the Timeline carefully to learn from your mistakes.
Skills are used automatically based on the order in which they're equipped.
Make sure to check for a monster's Element and use that information to your advantage.
Don't miss out on your daily Accel opportunity.
Accel's effect can be used on all party members.
No enemy is too tough to handle as long as you fight as a party.
Don't worry about failing Challenges. You can always regroup and try again.
Once you obtain an identical skill of a higher grade, you can have it inherit the Enhance Level of your old skill.
Using an identical piece of gear as Fusion material will produce the same gear.
Successfully clear a dungeon to earn Ancient Coins.
Spend Ancient Coins on valuable items at the Ancient Shop.
Increase your Archeology Level to allow for more Explorations.
Skill Settings in Adventure mode allow you to adjust the settings of all your party members.
Adjusting your party members' skills in dungeons won't affect their actual skill settings.
Equipped Relics are used automatically when their respective skills are used.
Your Danger Level increases as you clear dungeons.
A higher Danger Level means harder dungeons will appear.
Your current stage progress will drop if you're defeated in normal monster battles.
Your current stage will not change even if you leave your party.
Take on the Ancient Fortress to obtain Element Scrolls.
U. Labyrinth is reset every month.
If monster attacks are too strong, try preventing their attacks using skills that block skill casting.
